title: How to play music through Skype - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming a Windows environment, you'll first need to Enable “Stereo Mix” in Windows.  Once you've done that, go to the Skype audio settings (Tools / Options), and set the Microphone to be Stereo Mix.   Then, call up the other Skype party and start the music playing on the local PC. The other end of the Skype call will hear the music down the line.

Skype is just another medium with which you use to communicate through your cell phone or computer. All you have to do is modify your computers audio. Right-click the “Speakers” icon on your Windows task bar. Right click an empty space on the “Select a recording device” pane and click “Show Disabled Devices.” Click “OK” to close the “Recording Devices” pane. You can now play music through Skype.
